entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers this evening and after midnight. Periods of rain beginning after midnight. Fog patches developing after midnight. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Temperature steady near 7. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of rain. Temperature falling to plus 1 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Amount 5 mm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. Temperature falling to plus 1 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 2.
